mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO payment_tb ( subject, body, notify_url, type, order_number, money, status, business_type, business_id, business_notify_url, acount_id, create_date, update_date) VALUES ( #{subject}, #{body}, #{notifyUrl}, #{type}, #{orderNumber}, #{money}, #{status}, #{businessType}, #{businessId}, #{businessNotifyUrl}, #{acountId}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate})
mapper.update:
UPDATE payment_tb
subject=#{subject},
body=#{body},
notify_url=#{notifyUrl},
type=#{type},
order_number=#{orderNumber},
money=#{money},
status=#{status},
business_type=#{businessType},
business_id=#{businessId},
business_notify_url=#{businessNotifyUrl},
acount_id=#{acountId},
create_date=#{createDate},
update_date=#{updateDate}
WHERE payment_id=#{paymentId}
mapper.select: SELECT payment_id, subject, body, notify_url, type, order_number, money, status, business_type, business_id, business_notify_url, acount_id, create_date, update_date FROM payment_tb WHERE payment_id=#{paymentId}
